Title: #353: The Art of Possibility with Benjamin Zander
Description:
If you’re lucky enough to witness Benjamin Zander at work conducting the Boston Philharmonic, you’ll instantly notice two things: his infectious passion for classical music and the sheer joy he brings to his work. And that, he says, is thanks to his unfailing belief in the power of possibility. Tune in to hear how possibility has transformed his personal and professional life and why living in a place of comparison and fear is nothing but self-destructive.
